detail_desc: Straight-cut shirt in a soft weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in an airy weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a seam with a small frill trim at the shoulders and waist. Jersey lining.

Single-breasted jacket in a recycled polyester weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an inner pocket. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Jacket in an airy linen and cotton weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, patch front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Unlined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen and cotton weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an inner pocket. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen and cotton weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an inner pocket. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen and cotton weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an inner pocket. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.

Set in soft, organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved wrapover bodysuit with press-studs down the sides and at the crotch. Top with long raglan sleeves and press-studs down one side. Trousers with an elasticated waist and full feet with elastication at the heels. Hat with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.

Set in soft, organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved wrapover bodysuit with press-studs down the sides and at the crotch. Top with long raglan sleeves and press-studs down one side. Trousers with an elasticated waist and full feet with elastication at the heels. Hat with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.

Set in soft, organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved wrapover bodysuit with press-studs down the sides and at the crotch. Top with long raglan sleeves and press-studs down one side. Trousers with an elasticated waist and full feet with elastication at the heels. Hat with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Sports trousers in sweatshirt fabric. High waist with wide elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and tapered legs. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Sports trousers in sweatshirt fabric. High waist with wide elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and tapered legs. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.

Cardigan and a pair of trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Patterned cardigan with press-studs down the front and long sleeves. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Cardigan and a pair of trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Patterned cardigan with press-studs down the front and long sleeves. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Straps with adjustable buttoning, concealed press-studs at the crotch and ribbed hems. Soft jersey lining at the top. The cotton content of the dungarees is organic.

Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Straps with adjustable buttoning, concealed press-studs at the crotch and ribbed hems. Soft jersey lining at the top. The cotton content of the dungarees is organic.
Blouse in airy chiffon with a pleated collar, V-neck opening at the front with ties at the top, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined.
Blouse in airy chiffon with a pleated collar, V-neck opening at the front with ties at the top, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Tailored shorts in an airy weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake back pocket.
Tailored shorts in an airy weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake back pocket.

Metal chain necklaces with pendants. Length 49 cm and 60 cm.
Metal chain necklaces with pendants. Length 49 cm and 60 cm.
Chelsea boots in matt imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Jersey linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel 4 cm.

Jumpsuit in twill made from a viscose blend with a collar, concealed buttons at the top and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back, flap chest pockets, and side pockets. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, zip fly and tapered legs with wide, covered elastication at the hems. Unlined.
Metal chain bracelets in various designs, one with a brushed metal plate.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck top in soft Tencel™ lyocell jersey.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck top in soft Tencel™ lyocell jersey.
Short-sleeved top in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a stand-up collar and half-zip at the top with a round pull.
Short-sleeved top in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a stand-up collar and half-zip at the top with a round pull.
Ankle boots in grained imitation leather with pointed toes, covered block heels and a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 10 cm.
Shirt in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front and open chest pockets. Long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Set with a necklace and signet ring in metal. The necklace has a round pendant with an embossed front and trigger clasp. Length of necklace approx. 60 cm.

Blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck at the front and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Short trumpet sleeves, a decorative drawstring down the front with a sewn-in bow, and a flounce at the hem.
Sleeveless dress with a sequined mesh front and satin back. Visible zip at the back and a flared skirt in several layers of tulle. Lined.
Large scarf in soft, gently draping satin with an all-over print.
Large scarf in soft, gently draping satin with an all-over print.

Suit trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a linen and cotton weave with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a linen and cotton weave with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Long-sleeved bodysuit and a pair of trousers in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders, a print motif on the front and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist, full feet with a print motif and appliqués on the front, and elasticated heels.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Short jumper in a soft knit with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Straight shirt jacket in soft fabric with a collar and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, front pockets, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and cuffs with a press stud. Unlined.

Straight shirt jacket in soft fabric with a collar and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, front pockets, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and cuffs with a press stud. Unlined.

Aviator-style sunglasses with decorations at the top. Metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
